    About me

    I work as a Machine Learning Developer at Kakao Enterprise in Korea, after graduating from the Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology, Korea with a master’s degree in speech signal processing.

    I am passionate about making conversational AI with various speech technology and natural language processing applications and developing technologies applicable.
